amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Economic Research Service by $7,726,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Economic Research Service by $7,726,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 290 (Roll no. 301).
